content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 15}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft cyan_dye, I need to craft blue_dye first. Blue_dye can be crafted by placing cornflower in the crafting grid. I have cornflower in slot 14, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 15}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the blue_dye, I need to move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 15}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft cyan_dye, I need to place blue_dye and green_dye side by side in the crafting grid. I have blue_dye in slot 13, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 15}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the blue_dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the green_dye to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the green_dye to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_dye
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 15}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the cyan_dye, I need to move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 2
